chapter.title: Prepare to Get Started
chapter.para: Before you get started using and sharing images, take a moment to review how to use API operations to send requests to and receive responses from Rackspace cloud services. Also, before you can use the &CImA;, you must first authenticate with the Rackspace cloud. If you're already familiar with these activities and you have your authentication token, go to Get Started With Images.
The following sections show you how to:

listitem.para: Work with API requests: see “Sending API Requests and Receiving Responses”.
Authenticate within Rackspace: see “Authenticate through the Rackspace Cloud Identity Service”.
